## Vector2.setAndNormalize() method

Set component values and then normalize the vector.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setAndNormalize(x: number, y: number): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number | The x component value. |
|  y | number | The y component value. |

this
